classifiedsCtrl

  1. - type in module

Classifieds controller

Methods

  • openSidebar();

    opens the sidebar by routing to #/classifieds/new

  • saveClassified(newClassified);

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    newClassified object

    Saves the classified in local vm.classifieds and shows toast to confirm.

  • showToast(message);

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    message string

    Shows a toast with the message.

  • getCategories(classifieds);

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    classifieds array

    Recieves an array of classifieds with nested categories.

    Returns

    array

    Returns an array of all unique categories.
